parts.text:
{"word":"retinere","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語)保持する、保つ、維持する、引き留める、引き止める、抑える、抑制する、記憶する","english_definition":"(Latin) to hold back, keep, restrain, detain, retain, maintain, remember","examples":[{"sentence":"Memoria tenemus beneficia.","translation":"我々は受けた恩恵を記憶している。（キケロ）","english_translation":"We remember benefits. (Cicero)"},{"sentence":"Retinere amicos est sapientia.","translation":"友人を保つことは知恵である。","english_translation":"To retain friends is wisdom."},{"sentence":"Milites in castris retinebantur.","translation":"兵士たちは陣営に留め置かれた。","english_translation":"The soldiers were kept in the camp."}],"collocations":["memoriam retinere (記憶する)","amicos retinere (友人を保つ)","vim retinere (力を保つ)","in officio retinere (職務に留める)"],"synonyms":["tenere","conservare","servare","cohibere","impedire"],"antonyms":["amittere","dimittere","laxare","permittere"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「re-」（再び、後ろへ）+「tenere」（持つ、保持する）から構成される。原インド・ヨーロッパ祖語の語根 *ten- （伸ばす、引く）に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"classical":"/reˈti.ne.re/","ecclesiastical":"/reˈti.ne.re/"},"inflection":{"tense_forms":{"present_active_indicative":["retineō","retinēs","retinet","retinēmus","retinētis","retinent"],"imperfect_active_indicative":["retinēbam","retinēbās","retinēbat","retinēbāmus","retinēbātis","retinēbant"],"future_active_indicative":["retinēbō","retinēbis","retinēbit","retinēbimus","retinēbitis","retinēbunt"],"perfect_active_indicative":["retinuī","retinuistī","retinuit","retinuimus","retinuistis","retinuērunt/retinuēre"],"pluperfect_active_indicative":["retinueram","retinuerās","retinuerat","retinuerāmus","retinuerātis","retinuerant"],"future_perfect_active_indicative":["retinuerō","retinueris","retinuerit","retinuerimus","retinueritis","retinuerint"],"present_active_subjunctive":["retineam","retineās","retineat","retineāmus","retineātis","retineant"],"imperfect_active_subjunctive":["retinērem","retinērēs","retinēret","retinērēmus","retinērētis","retinērent"],"perfect_active_subjunctive":["retinuerim","retinueris","retinuerit","retinuerimus","retinueritis","retinuerint"],"pluperfect_active_subjunctive":["retinuissem","retinuissēs","retinuisset","retinuissēmus","retinuissētis","retinuissent"],"present_active_infinitive":"retinēre","perfect_active_infinitive":"retinuisse","future_active_participle":"retentūrus"},"voice_forms":{"present_passive_indicative":["retineor","retinēris/retinēre","retinētur","retinēmur","retinēminī","retinentur"],"imperfect_passive_indicative":["retinēbar","retinēbāris/retinēbāre","retinēbātur","retinēbāmur","retinēbāminī","retinēbantur"],"future_passive_indicative":["retinēbor","retinēberis","retinēbitur","retinēbimur","retinēbiminī","retinēbuntur"],"perfect_passive_indicative":["retentus sum","retentus es","retentus est","retenti sumus","retenti estis","retenti sunt"],"pluperfect_passive_indicative":["retentus eram","retentus erās","retentus erat","retenti erāmus","retenti erātis","retenti erant"],"future_perfect_passive_indicative":["retentus erō","retentus eris","retentus erit","retenti erimus","retenti eritis","retenti erunt"],"present_passive_subjunctive":["retinear","retineāris/retineāre","retineātur","retineāmur","retineāminī","retineantur"],"imperfect_passive_subjunctive":["retinērer","retinērēris/retinērēre","retinērētur","retinērēmur","retinērēminī","retinērentur"],"perfect_passive_subjunctive":["retentus sim","retentus sīs","retentus sit","retenti sīmus","retenti sītis","retenti sint"],"pluperfect_passive_subjunctive":["retentus essem","retentus essēs","retentus esset","retenti essēmus","retenti essētis","retenti essent"],"present_passive_infinitive":"retinērī","perfect_passive_infinitive":"retentus esse"},"imperative":{"present":["retinē","retinēte"],"future":["retinetō","retinetō","retinetōte","retinentō"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「retinere」は、物理的な保持から抽象的な概念の維持まで、幅広い意味で使用されるラテン語の動詞です。記憶、感情、法律、人など、さまざまな対象を「保持する」ことを表現できます。派生語として、英語の「retain」があります。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"誤：Retineo ad te.","correct":"正：Te retineo.","note":"人を引き留める場合、「te retinere」のように、引き留める対象を直接目的語とするのが一般的です。"}],"priority":"★☆☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["retentio (名詞: 保持、抑制)","retentus (完了分詞: 保持された、抑えられた)","retinens (現在分詞: 保持している)","retinaculum (名詞: 留め具、保持するもの)"],"related_english_words":["retain","retention","retentive"]},"level_frequency":{"level":"intermediate","note":"古典ラテン語の語彙であり、現代の日常会話では一般的ではありません。"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「Retinere」はラテン語の動詞で、「保持する」「保つ」「引き留める」といった意味を持ちます。物理的な意味だけでなく、記憶や感情、関係などを維持するという抽象的な意味でも使われます。英語の「retain」の語源となっており、法律用語や学術的な文脈で見かけることがあります。古典ラテン語の学習や、ラテン語の知識が求められる分野で理解しておくと役立ちます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Leges civitatis retinere debemus.","translation":"我々は国家の法律を保持すべきである。","english_translation":"We ought to maintain the laws of the state.","type":"indicative","meaning_category":"保持する (法律)"},{"sentence":"Mementote quae vobis dixi, et ea in memoria retinete.","translation":"私があなた方に言ったことを覚えて、それを記憶に留めておきなさい。","english_translation":"Remember what I have said to you, and retain it in your memory.","type":"imperative","meaning_category":"記憶する"},{"sentence":"Noli lacrimas retinere.","translation":"涙をこらえないで。","english_translation":"Do not restrain your tears.","type":"imperative","meaning_category":"抑える"},{"sentence":"Si me amas, cur me non retines?","translation":"もし私を愛しているなら、なぜ私を引き留めないのですか？","english_translation":"If you love me, why do you not keep me back?","type":"indicative","meaning_category":"引き留める"},{"sentence":"Virtutem retinere difficile est.","translation":"美徳を保つことは難しい。","english_translation":"It is difficult to retain virtue.","type":"infinitive","meaning_category":"保つ"}]}
}
